claim_card.claim: The paper documents and analyzes an AI (DeepSeek) producing a computational-architectural interpretation of RGPx in response to whether RGPx is a layer or a replacement.
claim_card.test_hook: Re-run the same prompt to multiple models; check whether they independently produce an architectural (not purely linguistic) interpretation.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: documents and analyzes the first computational-architectural interpretation of Recursive Gradient Physics (RGPx) by an independent artificial intelligence, DeepSeek
